name: AXIOM [DEMO]
description:
Explore this gameboy world and chat up three goddess spirits!

arrow keys to move around, Z button to interact! I know it says A or z, but apparently its just Z!

Sorry for the repetitive music, still learning how to use the particular program that makes music for this. It does change up a little bit, but feel free to put on some other tunes while playing if it gets a bit much. 

I think I made this for a game jam, but honestly now I can't remember. 

Featuring characters from this art feature.

www.patreon.com/ruunemagick
